alert.note: Alert for Swains Island (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued July 10 at 7:28AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A High Surf Advisory remains in effect... * SURF...Surfs of 10 to 12 feet will continue to impact south and east facing shores due to a large southerly swell and moderate to fresh tradewinds. * TIMING...through the new week. * IMPACTS...strong rip currents and large surfs. Fautuaga mo galu maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 728 TAEAO ASO SA IULAI 10 2022 ...O loo fa`aauau le Fautuaga mo Galu maualuluga... * GALU...O galu e 10 i le 12 futu le maualuluga o le a aafia ai talafatai i saute ma sasa`e ona o a`uma tetele mai saute fa`apea le agi malosi o le tuaoloa. * TAIMI...seia oo i le vaiaso fou. * NOFOAGA AAFIA...E malosi aave o le sami ma e maualuluga galu. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O fautuaga mo galu maualuluga e faailoa mai ai le malolosi ma le tetele o galu o le a aafia ai gataifale ma matafaga, ma o le a malolosi aave o le sami e ono solo ai nisi o vaega o le matafaga. Ona o le siisii o peau o le sami, e fautuaina ai le mamalu lautele ma le au fai faiva ina ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga ona o le maualuluga o galu ua iai nei.
info.instruction: A high surf advisory indicates large breaking waves will affect beaches in the advisory area, producing dangerous rip currents and localized beach erosion. Also, it is extremely dangerous to fish or observe waves from rocks during high surf conditions. Unwary beach walkers can be caught off guard as waves suddenly race farther up the beach than normal.
